required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: ZACtima FASlodex Trial in Postmenopausal Advance Breast Cancer Patients Instead of ZACtima FASlodex Trial
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized,Double-blind,Parallel-group,Multicentre,Phase II Study to Evaluate the Safety and Pharmacological Activity of the Combination of Vandetanib (100 or 300 MG/Daily or Placebo)With Fulvestrant (Loading Dose)in Postmenopausal Advanced BC Patients

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective is to assess the event-free survival defined as the time from randomisation to progression, death without progression, loss to follow up, whichever occurred first..

primary_outcome.time_frame: Restaging (RECIST) is carried out at screening and every 3 months during the study until 1 year and than every 6 months until objective disease progression.
primary_outcome.description: Success rate (patients without progression and still on treatment at 24 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Time-To-Progression, Progression-Free Survival, Objective Tumor Response Rate (CR+PR), Disease Control Rate (CR+PR+SD) and Duration of Response (DOR)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Restaging (RECIST) is carried out at screening and every 3 months during the study until 1 year and than every 6 months until objective disease progression.
Assessments for survival must be made at the 60 day follow-up visit and then every 3 months, unless the patient withdraws consent.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and Type of Adverse Events (AEs), Clinically Significant Laboratory or Vital Sign Abnormalities and Electrocardiographic (ECG) Changes

arm_group.arm_group_label: Vandetanib at the dose of 100 mg
arm_group.description: vandetanib at the dose of 100 mg orally once-daily plus placebo to match vandetanib 300 mg orally once-daily plus fulvestrant LD (500 mg im. at day 1 and 250 mg at day 14, 28 and thereafter every 28th day +/- 3)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Vandetanib at the dose of 300 mg
arm_group.description: vandetanib at the dose of 300 mg orally once-daily plus placebo to match vandetanib 100 mg orally once-daily plus fulvestrant LD (500 mg im. at day 1 and 250 mg at day 14, 28 and thereafter every 28th day +/- 3)

arm_group.arm_group_label: Placebo to match vandetanib 100 mg and 300 mg
arm_group.description: placebo to match vandetanib 100 mg orally once-daily plus placebo to match vandetanib 300 mg orally once-daily plus fulvestrant LD (500 mg im. at day 1 and 250 mg at day 14, 28 and thereafter every 28th day +/- 3).

intervention.intervention_name: ZD6474 (Vandetanib at the dose of 100 mg)
intervention.description: 100 mg as a once daily oral dose, from Day 1 UNTIL disease progression or unacceptable toxicity or consent withdrawal whichever occurs first
intervention.arm_group_label: Vandetanib at the dose of 100 mg

intervention.intervention_name: Placebo to match ZD6474 (Vandetanib at the dose of 100 mg)
intervention.description: Placebo of 300 mg as a once daily oral dose, from Day 1 UNTIL disease progression or unacceptable toxicity or consent withdrawal whichever occurs first
intervention.arm_group_label: Vandetanib at the dose of 300 mg
Placebo to match vandetanib 100 mg and 300 mg

intervention.description: All patients will receive fulvestrant Loading Dose (LD). The Loading Dose regimen is 500mg (2 injections) at day 1, followed by 250mg at day 14, 28 and every 28 days thereafter.
intervention.arm_group_label: Vandetanib at the dose of 100 mg
Vandetanib at the dose of 300 mg
Placebo to match vandetanib 100 mg and 300 mg

intervention.intervention_name: ZD6474 (Vandetanib at the dose of 300 mg)
intervention.description: 300 mg as a once daily oral dose, from Day 1 UNTIL disease progression or unacceptable toxicity or consent withdrawal whichever occurs first.
intervention.arm_group_label: Vandetanib at the dose of 300 mg

intervention.intervention_name: Placebo to match ZD6474 (Vandetanib at the dose of 300 mg)
intervention.description: Placebo of 100 mg as a once daily oral dose, from Day 1 UNTIL disease progression or unacceptable toxicity or consent withdrawal whichever occurs first
intervention.arm_group_label: Vandetanib at the dose of 100 mg
Placebo to match vandetanib 100 mg and 300 mg

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Post menopausal women with locally advanced or metastatic breast cancer
- Patients may have either measurable or non-measurable disease, as defined by RECIST criteria
- One previous hormone therapy or one previous chemotherapy for advanced disease are allowed (patients who have stable but evident disease after chemotherapy are eligible)
- estrogen receptor positive ER+ and/or progesterone receptor positive PR+ on primary or secondary tumour
Exclusion Criteria:
- Hormone receptor negative tumours (ER and PR negative)
- Presence of life-threatening metastatic visceral disease
- Significant cardiovascular event (e.g. myocardial infarction, superior vena cava [SVC] syndrome, New York Heart Association [NYHA] classification of heart disease ³2) within 3 months before entry, or presence of cardiac disease that in the opinion of
- History of arrhythmia or QTc with Bazett's correction unmeasurable or ≥ 480 msec on screening ECG

reference.citation: Ciardiello F, Caputo R, Damiano V, Caputo R, Troiani T, Vitagliano D, Carlomagno F, Veneziani BM, Fontanini G, Bianco AR, Tortora G. Antitumor effects of ZD6474, a small molecule vascular endothelial growth factor receptor tyrosine kinase inhibitor, with additional activity against epidermal growth factor receptor tyrosine kinase. Clin Cancer Res. 2003 Apr;9(4):1546-56.

clinical_study.keyword: post-menopausal women with hormone receptor positive advanced breast cancer

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: 39 participants were randomized to receive vandetanib or placebo.

group.title: Vandetanib at the Dose of 100 mg
group.description: vandetanib at the dose of 100 mg orally once-daily plus placebo to match vandetanib 300 mg orally once-daily plus fulvestrant LD (500 mg im. at day 1 and 250 mg at day 14, 28 and thereafter every 28th day +/- 3)

group.description: vandetanib at the dose of 300 mg orally once-daily plus placebo to match vandetanib 100 mg orally once-daily plus fulvestrant LD (500 mg im. at day 1 and 250 mg at day 14, 28 and thereafter every 28th day +/- 3)

group.title: Placebo to Match Vandetanib 100 mg and 300 mg
group.description: placebo to match vandetanib 100 mg orally once-daily plus placebo to match vandetanib 300 mg orally once-daily plus fulvestrant LD (500 mg im. at day 1 and 250 mg at day 14, 28 and thereafter every 28th day +/- 3).

baseline.population: No data were analyzed due to the premature study interruption and sample of patients was too low.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: If no publication has occurred within 12 months of the completion of the study, the Investigator shall have the right to publish/present independently the results of the study. The Investigator shall provide the Sponsor with a copy of any such presentation/publication for comment at least 30 days before any presentation/submission for publication. If requested by the Sponsor, any presentation/submission shall be delayed up to 90 days, to allow the Sponsor to preserve its proprietary rights.
